availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Madison W. Strode (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer, prvt & corp 8th Ky Cav.)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Missouri native. Son of Lucinda Strode. Student in Fishing River, Missouri, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1863. Served in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private and corporal from September 13, 1862, to September 23, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Missouri, Clay County, Fishing River, p. 381A.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0093.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, August 1863, p. 154.
